name: Dog Quest and the Hunt for Pawbeard's Booty
name_original: Dog Quest and the Hunt for Pawbeard's Booty
description:
Control dog powers such as barking, digging and sniffing to overcome the challenges ahead in this 3D isometric action/adventure game.

Recommended resolution: 1080 x 1920

Controls

  • WASD -Move
  • G - Action/Attack/Dig (Open doors and treasures)
  • H - Bark (Scare off cats)
  • Q/R - To rotate the camera

Credits

Dominik Lussier-Marcotte - Game Design, Digital Art, Models, VFX
Christ Laurenz Sambrano - Level Design, Programming
Camilo Arturo Castro Rizo - AI Programming
Peter MacTavish - Concept Art

Dog Quest and the Hunt for Pawbeard's Booty is a prototype game that was made for a Dawson College class.
